ImageFunction.operateRect

機能/意味
Rectangle operation composition
タイプ
ImageFunctionクラスのメソッド
構文
operateRect(dst, dleft, dtop, src, srcrect=null, cliprect=null, mode=omAuto, face=dfAlpha, opa=255, hda=false)
引数
dst 　Specify the Bitmap object to overlay.
dleft 　Specify the left end position of the destination rectangle in pixels (at the destination Bitmap image position).
dtop 　Specify the top position of the destination rectangle in pixels (at the destination Bitmap image position).
src 　Specify the source Bitmap object.
　When not specified, the entire target is used.
srcrect 　Specify the rectangle to operate on in a Rect object in pixel units (at the image position of the source Bitmap).
　When not specified, the entire target is used.
cliprect 　Specify the clipping rectangle as a Rect object (at the image position of the overlay Bitmap).
　If not specified, no clipping is performed.
mode 　Specify the operation mode.
If omPsNormal is specified, Photoshop compatible alpha compositing will be performed.
If omPsAdditive is specified, dodge (linear) composition compatible with Photoshop is performed.
If omPsSubtractive is specified, burning (linear) synthesis compatible with Photoshop will be performed.
If omPsMultiplicative is specified, Photoshop compatible multiplication and synthesis will be performed.
If omPsScreen is specified, Photoshop compatible screen composition is performed.
If omPsOverlay is specified, overlay composition compatible with Photoshop is performed.
If omPsHardLight is specified, Photoshop compatible hard light composition is performed.
If omPsSoftLight is specified, Photoshop compatible soft light synthesis will be performed.
If omPsColorDodge is specified, dodge color composition compatible with Photoshop is performed.
If omPsColorDodge5 is specified, dodging color composition compatible with Photoshop version 5.x or lower is performed.
If omPsColorBurn is specified, Photoshop compatible burn-in color composition is performed.
If omPsLighten is specified, Photoshop compatible comparison (bright) synthesis will be performed.
If omPsDarken is specified, Photoshop compatible comparison (dark) composition is performed.
When omPsDifference is specified, the absolute value of the difference compatible with Photoshop is synthesized.
If omPsDifference5 is specified, the absolute value of the difference in compatibility with Photoshop version 5.x or lower is synthesized.
If omPsExclusion is specified, exclusion synthesis compatible with Photoshop is performed.
When omAdditive is specified, addition synthesis is performed.
If omSubtractive is specified, subtraction synthesis is performed.
When omMultiplicative is specified, multiplication and synthesis are performed.
If omDodge is specified, dodging synthesis is performed.
If omDarken is specified, comparison (dark) synthesis is performed.
If omLighten is specified, comparison (bright) synthesis is performed.
If omScreen is specified, screen multiplication will be performed.
If omAlpha is specified, alpha synthesis will be performed.
If omAddAlpha is specified, additive alpha synthesis will be performed.
If omOpaque is specified, the alpha information of src is ignored and src is always assumed to be completely opaque.
face 　Specify the drawing method.
If dfAlpha is specified, the image is assumed to be an image with an alpha channel and is drawn.
If dfAddAlpha is specified, the image will be considered as an image with an additional alpha channel and drawn.
If dfOpaque is specified, all images are assumed to be completely opaque and are drawn.
opa 　Specifies the strength of the operation (0-255).
hda 　Specifies whether to protect the alpha channel.
戻り値
なし (void)
説明
　Computes the rectangular part of the specified operation source Bitmap at the specified position of the operation destination Bitmap in the specified mode.
